dashboard/apps/previewer.fma/bower_components/jquery/src/css/addGetHookIf.js
define(function() { function addGetHookIf( conditionFn, hookFn ) {

Define the hook, we'll check on the first run if it's really needed.

return { get: function() { if ( conditionFn() ) {

Hook not needed (or it's not possible to use it due to missing dependency), remove it.

delete this.get; return; }

Hook needed; redefine it so that the support test is not executed again.

return (this.get = hookFn).apply( this, arguments ); } }; } return addGetHookIf; });
